result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isiah M. Christopher

records.addlTxt:
3:24 PM Prosecuting attorney Alexander Huber in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Isiah M. Christopher in court.  Attorney Joseph Corcoran in court for Isiah M. Christopher. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: 21CM1614/22CM1073. Victim rights compliance. Attorney Henry files a stipulation for substitution of attorney for Case 21CM1614 as Attorney Corcoran has a conflict. Court will allow Attorney Corcoran to withdraw from 21CM1614. Attorney Henry would be requesting an adjournment so may obtain the discovery and review it with the DE. The State does not object. Court adjourns.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Final pre-trial on October 6, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
FPT adj from 9/12 to 10/6; confirming email sent to attys

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Gary W, Layla A

01:50 - 01:53 PM  
  Attorney Emily Gaertner appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Joseph Corcoran.  Clerk PU.  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.   Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel. Plea of Not Guilty entered.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 03:00 pm.  $150  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).    jk
and witness list filed by the State
